text.section: An agreement of consolidation, merger, or transfer of assets shall be approved by the affirmative vote of a majority of the full authorized membership of the board of directors of each constituent commercial bank.

section.section: Except as otherwise provided by law, any person who knowingly submits false information to the Commissioner while complying with subsection (c) of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor.
A person who violates this section is subject to a fine of not more than $1,000, or imprisonment for not more than 5 years, or both.
